verses.text_plain: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.
verses.verse_html:
1God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods. ▼
▼ of Asaph: or, for Asaph

tokens.definition: אֱלֹהִים ʼĕlôhîym, el-o-heem'; plural of H433 ; gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative:—angels, × exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), × (very) great, judges, × mighty.

verses.text_plain: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.
